website_summaries.verdict: The best blush palette for creating simple, natural looks.
pros: Combination of matte and shimmer blushes in six everyday shades, including pinks, peaches, and nudes
A little product goes a long way
Color lasts all day and is easy to blend
The large mirror is excellent for on-the-go application
cons: Shimmer shades need to be built up for the color to really come through

customer_reviews.title: Cute, really nice high-end blush palette
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a multi-pan blush palette (mattes and shimmer) for use on fair- fair tan skin tone. From a presitigious/label name brand. Absolutely beautiful! Multiple shades to compliment my skin tone (if I'm going for a warmer or cooler/shimmer look). Def got what I wanted (I have a separate palette for bronzer/highlight/shimmer). Apply with ELF tapered blush brush or RealTechn Blush brush on top of my contour/bronzer. Along the hairline, under jaw, and slight bit on nose. And def gives the "label snob" appeal of NARS. ALL women should wear blush regardless of makeup taste or skin tone. NOTHING gives more of a feminine mystique to the face than blusher (thank perhaps lipstick... which really compliments blush all together).
customer_reviews.author: Analytical VTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: NARS Girl😍♥️💄
customer_reviews.text: Omg! What can I say? I’m OBSESSED with this! I wear nothing but NARS... it’s great in texture and feel. It’s so beautiful. I highly recommend this product. 😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Cadie Alena

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I'm positive the item I received is authentic Nars. Of all the Nars face palettes I've ever seen this is the only one that ever interested me as I can use all the colors/shades. And the price could not be beat! So glad to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: Rizzles

customer_reviews.title: So in love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette and will buy more. I bought 2 and gave the other one to my sister. Thank God they came in tact, no breaks or flaws.
customer_reviews.author: yelabombshell

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEEEEEE
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how much I loved blush until I met this palette lol
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kersey

customer_reviews.title: If you love it buy it. ☺️☺️☺️👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I never doubt to order Nars. because I know and I believe it’s very nice brand for every girls that could wear make up. like raise 1 to 10 it would no.1 and I made the right choice to buy this one and thanks god this item i buy together with the make up brush and tarte palette contour Nars is not damage so still I’m happy I really love the color it’s really nice to any type of make up you choose like simple, glamour any kind very much love it 🥰♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Eloiza Datoy

customer_reviews.title: Best blush palette!
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette! The colors are great and each blush is good sized
customer_reviews.author: AlexandraJulia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this collection! Extremely fast delivery!!! I'll definitely will be ordering from this store again!!! Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Spurgion

customer_reviews.title: you can never go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.text: super pigmented and the variety of colors are so good, amazing for every type of looks youre going for!
customer_reviews.author: Noura Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Natural, lasting
customer_reviews.text: Naturally, like the natural blush that penetrates the skin, it is also very long-lasting.And use a small amount
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Nars-issist
customer_reviews.text: Crazy fast shipping! I wasn’t expecting it today so awesome surprise. The heaviness and good packaging proves it’s real and NOT a knock off. Onto the palette of blushes, they are perfection. I can’t wsit to use all the blushes! This is a must have for make up junkies like me! Can’t beat the price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok...
customer_reviews.text: Meh! Not too thrilled about this. It’s sub par and comparable to other cheap retail store brands. Nothing to right home about. The colors look pretty in the pallet but they are very translucent and hard to see on the face unless you apply many applications.
customer_reviews.author: CD

product_meta.title: NARS NARSissist Unfiltered II Limited Edition Blush Palette for Cheeks - UK Version - .12 ounces x 6 Includes Hot Sand, Conquest, Undefeated, Power Play, Candid and Fame
product_meta.description: Sculpt, shape, and glow to your heart’s desire with a coveted wardrobe of six high-impact matte and shimmer blushes, all in one customized palette. Wear soft pinks and golds individually or blend to personalize your style, cheek to cheek. The range of subtle to intense shades allows for universal appeal and versatility. No filter. No limits. #NARSissist.
feature_bullets: A CURATED SELECTION OF SIX COOL-TONE, MUST-HAVE BLUSH SHADES IN A LIMITED EDITION, MIRRORED PALETTE.

Set includes: I - Conquest: Pastel peach (matte) II - Undefeated: Pale pink (shimmer) III - Power Play: Vivid pink (matte) IV - Hot Sand: Peach champagne (sheen) V - Fame: Pink amber (sheen) VI - Candid: Mauve raspberry (shimmer)
Each Blush is .12 ounces. For reference a full size NARS blush is 0.16 ounces
